attributes.action: Get rid of Tony Pulis from Stoke City Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the fans, led by our minds, want this person out of Stoke for good. Tony Pulis is tactically inept for championship football and we, the Stoke City fans believe Pulis would be better as a tactical master for the British Army. (He cant as worse as what we have got there at the moment?)

Please sign this petition and we can rid of the Anti-Christ known as Tony Pulis

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
